body: never stated from the rules if we can use laby mod tho i didn't know if it accounts as a legal modification so just wanted to check
body_tagged: never stated from the rules if we can use laby mod tho i didn't know if it accounts as a legal modification so just wanted to check
title: laby allowed?

replies.body: Yes, Laby Mod is allowed. The only version (as far as I'm aware) that is not allowed are the ones with the blockhit/eating while breaking a block animations.
replies.body_tagged: Yes, Laby Mod is allowed. The only version (as far as I'm aware) that is not allowed are the ones with the blockhit/eating while breaking a block animations.

replies.body: oh ok then i guess just lock this as this has been answered
